metadata.name: Run #1
metadata.description:
This work expresses lyricism from human sensibility projected on the natural aesthetics. It shows natural objects such as rocks, trees, grass, and flowers to compose body elements of iconic figures that transcend the limits of birth and death. Despite looking insignificant and fragile by nature, these iconic figures manifest the cycle of life much like flowers blooming and fading repeatedly. 

#NFTart  #run   #stone   #physical-based   #animated
